com.heaven7.java.game.base.state

接口 StateMachine<E extends StateMachineSupplier<E>>

  • 类型参数:
    E - the entity which implement StateMachineSupplier.
    所有已知实现类:
    DefaultStateMachine, StackStateMachine

    public interface StateMachine<E extends StateMachineSupplier<E>>
    the state machine , support multi state change at the same time.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void changeState(int newStates)
      change to the state
      int changeState(int newStates, java.util.List<State<E>> outOldStates)
      change the current states.
      java.util.List<State<E>> getCurrentState(java.util.List<State<E>> outStates)
      Returns the current state of this state machine. outStates can be null.
      java.util.List<State<E>> getGlobalState(java.util.List<State<E>> outStates)
      return the global state, outStates can be null.
      java.util.List<State<E>> getPreviousState(java.util.List<State<E>> outStates)
      Returns the last state of this state machine. outStates can be null.
      boolean isInState(int states)
      Indicates whether the state machine is in the given state.
      boolean revertToPreviousState()
      Change state back to the previous state.
      void setGlobalState(int states)
      Sets the global state of this state machine.
      void setInitialState(int states)
      Sets the initial state of this state machine.
      void update()
      update the state machine

    • 方法详细资料

      • update

        void update()
        update the state machine

      • changeState

        int changeState(int newStates,
                java.util.List<State<E>> outOldStates)
        change the current states.
        参数:
        newStates - the new state flags
        outOldStates - the old states, can be null.
        返回:
        the old states flags.

      • changeState

        void changeState(int newStates)
        change to the state
        参数:
        newStates - the new state to change to.

      • revertToPreviousState

        boolean revertToPreviousState()
        Change state back to the previous state.
        返回:
        True in case there was a previous state that we were able to revert to. In case there is no previous state, no state change occurs and false will be returned.

      • setInitialState

        void setInitialState(int states)
        Sets the initial state of this state machine.
        参数:
        states - the initial state.

      • setGlobalState

        void setGlobalState(int states)
        Sets the global state of this state machine.
        参数:
        states - the global state.

      • getCurrentState

        java.util.List<State<E>> getCurrentState(java.util.List<State<E>> outStates)
        Returns the current state of this state machine. outStates can be null.
        参数:
        outStates - optional , can be null
        返回:
        the state list

      • getGlobalState

        java.util.List<State<E>> getGlobalState(java.util.List<State<E>> outStates)
        return the global state, outStates can be null.
        参数:
        outStates - optional , can be null
        返回:
        the state list

      • getPreviousState

        java.util.List<State<E>> getPreviousState(java.util.List<State<E>> outStates)
        Returns the last state of this state machine. outStates can be null.
        参数:
        outStates - optional , can be null
        返回:
        the state list

      • isInState

        boolean isInState(int states)
        Indicates whether the state machine is in the given state.

        This implementation assumes states are singletons (typically an enum) so they are compared with the == operator instead of the equals method.

        参数:
        states - the state to be compared with the current state
        返回:
        true if the current state and the given state are the same object.
